contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Västerbotten | native_name = Västerbottens län | native_name_lang = se | settlement_type = [[Counties of Sweden|County of Sweden]] | image_flag = | flag_size = | image_shield = Västerbotten län vapen.svg | shield_size = 75px | image_blank_emblem = SverigesLän2007Västerbotten.svg | blank_emblem_type =   | blank_emblem_size = 150px | latd = |latm = |lats = |latNS = N | longd = |longm = |longs = |longEW = E | coordinates_display = inline,title | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Sweden]] | established_date = 1638 | seat_type = Capital | seat = [[Umeå]] | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = [[Magdalena Andersson]] | leader_title1 = Council | leader_name1 = Västerbottens Läns Landsting | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 55401 | population_total = 259239 |population_footnotes =<ref name="scb_kvartal_1_2011">{{cite web | title=Kvartal 1 2011 | publisher=[[Statistics Sweden]] | url=http://www.scb.se/Pages/TableAndChart____228187.aspx}}</ref> | population_as_of = March 31 2011 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | blank_name_sec1 = [[Gross domestic product|GDP/ Nominal]] | blank_info_sec1 = [[Swedish krona|SEK]] 55,534 million (2004) | blank1_name_sec1 = [[Gross domestic product|GDP per capita]] | blank1_info_sec1 = [[Swedish krona|SEK]] 218,000 | blank_name_sec2 = [[First level NUTS of the European Union#Sweden|NUTS Region]] | blank_info_sec2 = SE331 }} '''Västerbotten County''' (''Västerbottens län'') is a [[Counties of Sweden|county]] or ''[[län]]'' in the north of [[Sweden]]. It borders the counties of [[Västernorrland County|Västernorrland]], [[Jämtland County|Jämtland]], and [[Norrbotten County|Norrbotten]], as well as the [[Norway|Norwegian]] county of [[Nordland]] and the [[Gulf of Bothnia]]. == Provinces == ''For History, Geography and Culture see: [[Västerbotten]], [[Lapland, Sweden|Lapland]] and [[Ångermanland]]'' Västerbotten County covers the province of Västerbotten and parts of the provinces Lapland and Ångermanland. == Administration == The main aim of the [[County Administrative Boards of Sweden|County Administrative Board]] is to fulfil the goals set in national politics by the [[Riksdag]] and the [[Government of Sweden|Government]], to coordinate the interests of the county, to promote the development of the county, to establish regional goals and safeguard the due process of law in the handling of each case. The County Administrative Board is a [[Government Agencies in Sweden|Government Agency]] headed by a Governor. See [[List of Västerbotten Governors]]. == Politics == The [[County Councils of Sweden|County Council]] of Västerbotten or ''Västerbotten Läns Landsting''. <br clear=right> == Municipalities == [[Image:Västerbotten County.png|right|350px]] *[[Bjurholm Municipality|Bjurholm]] *[[Dorotea Municipality|Dorotea]] *[[Lycksele Municipality|Lycksele]] *[[Malå Municipality|Malå]] *[[Nordmaling Municipality|Nordmaling]] *[[Norsjö Municipality|Norsjö]] *[[Robertsfors Municipality|Robertsfors]] *[[Skellefteå Municipality|Skellefteå]] *[[Sorsele Municipality|Sorsele]] *[[Storuman Municipality|Storuman]] *[[Umeå Municipality|Umeå]] *[[Vilhelmina Municipality|Vilhelmina]] *[[Vindeln Municipality|Vindeln]] *[[Vännäs Municipality|Vännäs]] *[[Åsele Municipality|Åsele]] == Heraldry == The arms for Västerbotten County is a combination of the arms of [[Västerbotten]], [[Swedish Lapland]] and [[Ångermanland]]. When it is shown with a royal crown it represents the County Administrative Board. Blazon: "Parted per fess, base parted per pale, the arms of Västerbotten, the arms of Lapland and the arms of Ångermanland." ==References and notes == {{Reflist|2}} == External links == *[http://www.regionvasterbotten.se/ Regional Association of Local Authorities in Västerbotten] *[http://www.ac.lst.se/ Västerbotten County Administrative Board] *[http://www.vll.se/ Västerbotten County Council] {{Counties of Sweden}} {{Västerbotten County}} {{coord|64.344665|N|18.314209|E|source:ndswiki_region:SE|format=dms|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Vasterbotten County}} [[Category:Counties of Sweden]] [[Category:Västerbotten County| ]] [[Category:Västerbotten|County]] [[Category:Lapland (Sweden)]]
